article: gen. stanley a. mcchrystal retired on friday with the full pageantry of a ##-gun salute , an army marching band and an emotional send-off from the secretary of defense , but with his own acknowledgment that he was not leaving the military on his own terms .
abstract: mcchrystal ends service with regret and a laugh
